contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 18th day of May, 1998, we AFFIRM the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County on the basis of our Opinion in Sullivan v. Commonwealth, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing, — Pa. -, 708 A.2d 481 (1998), and without regard to the constitutionality of Article IV of the Driver License Compact of 1961.
